Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires dealers to disclose information regarding fees for updating maps on global positioning systems installed in motor vehicles
Summary: Requires dealers to disclose information regarding fees for updating maps on global positioning systems installed in motor vehicles.
LawCode: Amd ยง396-qq, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring dealers to disclose information regarding fees for updating maps on global positioning systems installed in motor vehicles
